text: Siamese Irattakal is a 1997 Indian Malayalam film directed by Ismail Hassan and starring Jagathy Sreekumar and Baiju in the lead roles.http://spicyonion.com/title/siamese-irattakal-malayalam-movie/ ==Cast== * Sainudeen as Preman * Maniyanpilla Raju as Dasan * Saradha Preetha as Sofy * Jagathy Sreekumar * Lalu Alex *Kalabhavan Mani as Supran *Machan Vargees as Sujathan ==References== ==External links== * Category:1997 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Siamese Irattakal
